Le jeu des Dragons
Three-Dragon Ante
スリードラゴン・アンティ

boardgame.description: Three-Dragon Ante is a fast-paced noncollectable card game based on the games of chance played by characters within the D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D game world. Three-Dragon Ante can be played as a standalone card game, or it can be played as part of a roleplaying campaign-where the abilities of each player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;acute;s character give him or her a unique winning edge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Three-Dragon Ante is a force-bid game where the pot goes to the player who built the best dragon flight this round. Each turn you play a card into your _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;flight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, and if equal in strength or weaker than the dragon played by the prior player, that dragon's power activates (draw cards, take cards from opponents, steal from the pot, etc). Game ends once one player goes bankrupt._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Three-Dragon Ante: Emperor's Gambit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Luck of the Draw (RPGGeek item)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: NEW AND FACTORY FRESH We are a small, family owned and operated game shoppe. Like you, we simply love board games! You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only pay $3.99 to have your THREE-DRAGON ANTE game shipped via USPS 2-4 DAY MAIL. Of course, you can always add USPS shipping insurance for $1.35. Please have a look at our other listings on BoardGameGeek. We now have well over 200, and we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re still growing! We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll discount your shipping costs if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to order more than one item. International orders, please inquire about shipping costs through email before ordering. North Dakota residents are responsible for 6% sales tax. Thank you, Jeremy, Jennifer, and Family J and J Board Games

Wizards of the Coast (WOC 95612) DUNGEONS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; DRAGONS THREE-DRAGON ANTE CARD GAME Three-Dragon Ante is a fast-paced noncollectable card game based on the tavern games played by characters within the D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D game world. Three-Dragon Ante can be played as a standalone card game when there isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t enough time for a full-fledged D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D adventure, or it can be played as part of a roleplaying campaign-where a character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s abilities can give him or her a unique winning edge. For 2-6 players. Great for dedicated D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D gamers or anyone interested in a cool, fast, fantasy-based game of chance.

Spezielle handgefertigte Edition: Ich habe alle Spielkarten laminiert und ausgeschnitten, da es keine Hüllen für diese merkwürige Kartenform gibt und die Karten ohne Schutz nach nur wenigen Spielen abgenutzt gewesen wären. Die 2 Spielzug Karten sind nicht laminiert. Zusätzlich habe ich eine Tragebox aus einem schwarzen Federmachen gefertigt mit dem Three-Dragon-Ante Wappen auf der Vorderseite. Ein schwarzer Stoffbeutel mit 73 Plastikmünzmarkern in 4 verschiedenen Größen sowie die orginal Spielschachtel gehören auch dabei. Zustand: fast neu, wurde zweimal gespielt Ich akzeptiere SEPA Überweisung und Paypal (für Paypal 1€ hinzufügen). Versicherter Versand per DHL innerhalb Deutschlands beträgt 5€. Would ship worldwide, but shipping cost could be horrendous. If you are really interessted please ask for shipping.
